Chapter Previous Next

class gstLineIntersectionInfo

Stores status of intersection of line with some object. This status may indicate no intersection, no intersection with line inside object, no intersection with line outside object, intersection into object, intersection into and out of object, intersection out of object, and intersection through object using the respective enumerations of gstLineIntersectionInfo::IntersectionType.

From header file: gstLineIntersectionInfo.h

Constructors and Destructors
gstLineIntersectionInfoConstructor.
Functions
getStatus Returns the status of the intersection.
setStatus Sets status of the intersection to status.
status Returns the status of the intersection.
